experience.desc: I worked as a web developer & graphics designer, where I designed and developed the company website using PHP and JavaScript. I designed various graphics for the website and social media accounts. I also developed various online content and marketing tools for the promotion for the company.

As the Technical Activities Coordinator at IEEE MSIT, I was responsible for conducting events and programs for students of MSIT where they could learn to make projects to tackle real world problems, also guiding and mentoring students for building these projects. I organised Special Interest Groups (SIGs) and Summer Project to Product Program (mentorship program during summer break). I was also the lead for organising the annual college Tech Fest and Technical Projects Exhibition (A national level exhibition).

I was a trainee, learning the fundamentals of Java. I also worked with JSPs and Servlets. I worked on Cloud Services such as Google App Engine and AWS. I led my team to develop a social media application called Talenholic, using Java.

I was working as a Business Analytics Intern, where I was researching into recruitment companies in the United States of America. I also developed the content for the company's website along with that of their sister company 'ErinLabs'. I also compiled the data and the progress report for the month's projects.

projects.name: Serama Logistics Pvt. Ltd. Website
projects.desc: The Official Website for Serama Logistics Pvt. Ltd. built using PHP. The website involves a mailing service at the backend. The frontend is built using CSS and JS

projects.name: Brayan's Diary
projects.desc: My Personal Blog developed using MERN Stack to showcase my poetry and other writings to the world. The Backend involves the CRUD for posts. Also the visitors can post theirs comments on individual posts as well

projects.name: Genetic Algorithm For Global Maxima & Minima
projects.desc: Instead of calculating the Global Maxima And Minima by a tiring Integration and Differentiation Method, this algorithm calculates Global Maxima and Minima for Complex Expressions using Evolutionary Method.

projects.name: Eye Mouse For Motor Impaired
projects.desc: This is a program which allows users to control the mouse using their eyes. This program is beneficial for users with disabilities or partial paralysis who are not able to use  a mouse to communicate using a computer.

projects.name: Placement Software
projects.desc: At IEEE MSIT, our team developed a software for the placement department of MSIT. The software filters students from a database based on criteria set by the visiting company on campus. The software also sends notification mails and SMS to students selected for further rounds

projects.name: IEEE MSIT Website
projects.desc: The Official Website for IEEE MSIT Student Branch. Built using Django. I maintained the website and also developed various features such as Blog, Visitor Counter and redesigning of various pages.
